name: Naval Campaigns 1:  JUTLAND
summary: This first installment of the Naval Campaigns series features a REALTIME game engine that allows the player to play against the computer or against another player (or players) online. JUTLAND is a tactical battle simulation which models individual ships and capabilities.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
  • 官方网站: http://www.hpssims.com/Pages/Products/NavCamp/Jutland/jutland.html
